title: YOU'VE BEEN DISCONNECTED FROM CHAT, ATTEMPTING TO RECONNECT..
body: For the past 3 or 4 days, my friends list and post game chat have not been working. please help :(

replies.body:
Yes ,I have exactly the same problem and i don't know what to do.
I have tried everything, but i wasn't able to fix the problem.
I submitted a bug report to Riot in hopes they will help me, but sill nothing.

Also been having this problem for several days. I tried all of the things on the connection guide that Broporo suggested and none of them fixed it. I've also been unable to find solutions other places on the internet. Hope it gets cleared up soon.

EDIT: I misread the Broporo comment. Opening the ports fixed it for me. Best of luck to the rest of y'all.

Having the EXACT same issue for the past 4-5 days now (so along the same timeline as you). I've looked everywhere and have tried EVERYTHING on the internet to absolutely no success. It's incredibly frustrating not being able to type in lobbies or see/chat my friends. I submitted a ticket to Riot in hopes they look into this deeper. But it sounds like since so many people are having this issue it has something to do with the Client itself.
I've been experiencing the exact same problem. Hopefully someone will address it soon.

I've been seeing a few of these weird chat connection issues lately, but some players have been able to clear things up by adjusting their port forwarding settings. Refer to our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the steps in you need, but let's make sure that you've got port 5223 open.
